rukus.text: Boola mbu: “enywe Abasumba banje bakholelaobubiiemioyochiabu, mulawesiakhwo omwoyo khutsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye tawe, toto Nyasaye aleshelanga ebionoono bioosi, toto ye niye Omulesheli muno Omukoosia po.”
Mukalushile Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi mana mwilekhule khuye, eshinyasio nishishili okhubetsela mana mukhaye okhuhonokokha
Ne loonde amalayi muno akamweshilibwa okhurula khu Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi, eshinyasio nishishili okhubapwoka nanyu nimulamanyile tawe
Mana omwoyo kuletsa kwaboola mbu: “ abayie ndiyitsulisia khukambura ewa Nyasaye, ne toto esie ndali mubokhwikoyania”
Nohomba kuboole mbu: “ Nyasaye yanunjisinjia ndakhabeele mubalia bamuria”
Nohomba kuboole ebise bieshinyasio mbu: “ abayie nengalusibwayo nemba mubandu abalayi”
Shikanyalikhana tawe, toto ebimanyiso bianje biakhwitsila mana nobikhaya nofura noba mubakhayi
Ne inyanga yeyindukho olilola balia bakhaya ka Nyasaye wabu obweni bwabu nibumaliye, koo mu Jahannamu shinishio eshimenyo shiabafuru
Ne Nyasaye alihonia balia bamuria, khulwokhubura khwabu, shibalinyoolwa nobubii bwosi bwosi tawe, nohomba shibalibeelela tawe
Nyasye niye waloonga buli eshindu naye niye omulindi wa buli eshindu
Niye uli nende tsifunguo tsielikulu nende eshialo ne balia bakhaya ebimanyisio bia Nyasaye abo nibo balitiba
